YUKA, PRODUCT MANAGER, BUSINESS VENTURES
Percept has an excellent team with outstanding knowledge of numerous technologies. team is very reliable, hardworking, and dedicated to work. We look forward to working with him again in the near future. Great job Percept!
NEALE , C.E.O WBSOLUTIONS, WWW.WBSOLUTIONS.CO.UK
I worked with Percept Software Systems for approx. 5 years, during this period, we developed many system(s). Our first Objective was to create a Custom Web Solution with look feel like Excel for UK Customers, where data in grid should be drive from Database’s SPs. Percept pick this challenge and deliver this application with quality of code and all expected functionality. My Second Objective was Sync SAGE line 50 Data with our Web Solution, Again Percept did great Job here. I recommend Percept Software Systems to everyone as they have a solid professional team. A Team who always keen to help when you required. Always provide best in industry solution with nice budget. Thanks PERCEPT
CHAD COLLINS, CEO
Working with Percept since last 5 years, where I connected with Kulwant via Upwork. Kulwant is an excellent developer. He was open and communicative. he was also very knowledgeable and reliable. We would definitely continue our work with Percept in future..

Kulwant is beyond a full stack automation engineer who also develops QA automation solutions. Kulwant also manages his own technical team, assists us in 24hr dev/qa continuous development integration during US and Indian time zones. His knowledge in browser based automation with selenium, and his contribution to building us desktop testing tools needed to run thousands of parallel tests to support our regular releases was critical to the evolution of our QA departments service charter and to our continuing platform growth and health. Ive worked with Kulwant for more years than I can remember, and we will definitely hire him again. With so many challenging projects under our belts over the years, I am always able to rely on Kulwant to deliver. 10 stars Kulwant!

Kulwant has many years of full stack, and engineering leadership experience. He is also excellent at deciphering needs from technical and business managers. More-over, his dedication to delivery is one of his most outstanding qualities even beyond his almost countless languages and approaches he practices in his work. Every single project over the years I have involved Kulwant in, he has delivered, even under very tight deadlines, high pressure, and uncertainty. Kulwant is an asset to any team, and has skills from the bottom of the stack all the way to the top and including process and management. If you work with Kulwant, you will see value immediately up on adding him to your team.
